fields.description:
Its failing with following exception
{code}
java.lang.AssertionError: expected:<25> but was:<26>
	at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88)
	at org.junit.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:743)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:118)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:555)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:542)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ha.TestRetryCacheWithHA.testRetryCacheOnStandbyNN(TestRetryCacheWithHA.java:169)
{code}

comments.body: HDFS-10265 has added one more operation {{// OP_UPDATE_BLOCKS 25}} in test case which makes the retry cache elements size to {{26}}. Attached patch by just increasing the expected size, kindly review the patch. Thanks!
